page.title: 02Life in Woodham Ferrers
page.content: "My Mum goes to work at 9.00 to 5.30. We go shopping every week to a supermarket. When I grow up I am hoping I can be a pilot of British Airways. My house is in a builders' yard. In the school holidays I go with my Dad to help. My Dad is a builder. I like to play in the sheds in the yard. This year we are going to Yorkshire for a holiday. Our school is a Church of England school with 44 pupils and two classes. We have an outdoor swimming pool that is heated by solar panels. We start school at 9 and finish at 3.05. My Mum is kind because she buys me things. At school my teacher says I am a good worker. My hobby is collecting badges and rubbers. My Dad works as a gardener. He starts at 8.30 and finishes at 5. My Mum is a housewife. She does the washing, cooking and cleaning.
